channel.title: How do i change the size of the theme. ( #wrapper )
channel.description:
[size=14pt][b]Well, i have smf 2.0.4 Bright Forest Theme. And the width: is 90%; I want it 950px.. but when i change it, it's still 90% ( not working )
Any idea guys ?
This is now:[/b][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/jPzISvU.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]And i need it like this with 950px:[/b][/size]
[img]http://i.imgur.com/YYzNim9.png[/img]

item.title: How do i change the size of the theme. ( #wrapper )
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

AdminCP -> Configuration -> Current Theme -> Theme Settings ->

Edit it there.

Read full topic
